edu.mccc.cos210.ds

Interface Graph

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ListGraph, NFA

    public interface Graph
    Itereface to specify the Graph ADT. Each implementation should provide a constructor that specifies the number of veritcies and whether or not the grapgh is directed

        Edge getEdge(int source,
           int dest)
        Get the edge between two veritices.
        Parameters:
        source - The source vertex
        dest - The desitination vertex
        Returns:
        The Edge between these two vertices or an edge with a weight of Double.POSITIVE_INFINITY if there is no edge
